info.title: Platform status handler
info.description: Sets and gets the platform status data.

const.name: STATUS_OK
const.description: The platform status code for healthy platform.

const.name: STATUS_ERROR
const.description: The platform status code for platform with errors.

method.name: setStatus
method.description: Sets a specific platform status given a status code (class constant) and status description.

parameter.name: $statusCode
parameter.description: The status code. Use class constants. Otherwise it will be considered non valid and will return false.

parameter.name: $statusValue
parameter.description: The status description, usually used to describe errors.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getStatus
method.description: Gets the platform status with code and description.
method.returndescription: An array with the status values as: ['code'] = The platform status code (see class constants) ['description'] = The code description, usually in case of errors.

method.name: createFile
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.
